thread.title: Two dead in 'murder suicide' as riot cops storm house
thread.title_full: Two dead in 'murder suicide' as riot cops storm house

author: Louie Smith
title: Two dead in 'murder suicide' as riot cops storm house
text:
Two dead in 'murder suicide' as riot cops storm house Witnesses reported seeing riot police with shields entering the building where the bodies were found Share Emergency services at the scene (Photo: PA) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A woman was found dead and a man died later of stab wounds in a suspected Â­murder-suicide today. 
The body of the woman, who has not been identified, was found when riot police stormed a residential property. 
An injured man in the same home died a short time later. 
Both had suffered knife wounds and police say they are not looking for anybody else in connection with the incident. 
A spokeswoman said: "When police arrived at the address they found a woman had been stabbed and had tragically passed away. 
"A man was also found to be at the property with knife wounds. He also tragically passed away shortly after at the scene. 
"Investigations are on-going." 
The grim discovery was made in Cheshunt, Herts., yesterday lunchtime. 
Witnesses reported seeing riot police with shields entering the building where the bodies were found. 
Police say they are conducting a murder investigation following the death of the woman, suggesting she died first. 
Details of the deceased are yet to be released but it is understood they were known to each other. Like us on Facebook
